name: Rainbow Rage Squad (itch)
description:
RAGE IT UP!!!!!

Play the demo above! Or purchase and get the full game!

Controller / Keyboard

Start = Enter

A = Space

B = X

X = Z

Y = C

Left Trigger = Ctrl

Right Trigger = Shift

XBOX ONE browser demo - turn particles to "Low" for better performance

Features:

  • Up to 4 players Local
  • Local Co-Op
  • Time Trials
  • Battle Mode
  • 40 Levels
  • Boss Fights
  • Unlockables
  • Rage, and Rainbows!!!!
